entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:44 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 08:44 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
